data.comment: The big names in today's match at Stade Gaston Gerard have now been confirmed.
The match has started at Stade Gaston Gerard.
In the minute 1, It's a goal kick for the away team in Dijon-Prenois.
Ball safe as Lens is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Can Dijon get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Lens's half?
In the minute 3, Dijon have been awarded a corner by Eric Wattellier.
In Dijon-Prenois a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Corner awarded to Lens.
In the minute 4, In Dijon-Prenois, Arnaud Kalimuendo of Lens is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Corner awarded to Dijon.
Bruno Ecuele (Dijon) wins the ball in the air but heads wide.
In the minute 5, Eric Wattellier awards Lens a goal kick.
Free kick for Dijon in the half of Lens.
Dijon have been awarded a corner by Eric Wattellier.
In the minute 7, Throw-in Dijon.
Dijon have a goal kick.
Free kick for Lens in their own half.
In the minute 9, Eric Wattellier signals a free kick to Lens.
Lens have been awarded a corner by Eric Wattellier.
Free kick Dijon.
In the minute 12, Dijon drive upfield and Mama Balde gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Lens defender.
Throw-in high up the field for Dijon in Dijon-Prenois.
Corner awarded to Dijon.
In the minute 13, Important block from the Lens defence as Bruno Ecuele fires in a strike for Dijon.
Corner awarded to Dijon.
Mama Balde (Dijon) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
In the minute 17, Throw-in for Lens at Stade Gaston Gerard.
Dijon have been awarded a corner by Eric Wattellier.
Dijon's Roger Assale goes close with his head but his effort is blocked.
In the minute 19, Eric Wattellier awards the home team a throw-in.
Lens awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Chafik is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
Chafik has recovered and rejoins the match in Dijon-Prenois.
In the minute 23, Goal! Lens have got their heads in front thanks to a Arnaud Kalimuendo strike.
Throw-in for Lens in their own half.
In the minute 25, Throw-in for Lens in the half of Dijon.
Eric Wattellier signals a Lens throw-in in Dijon's half.
In the minute 26, Ball safe as Dijon is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In Dijon-Prenois a free kick has been awarded the home team.
David Linares (Dijon) is making a first substitution, with Jordan Marie replacing Wesley Lautoa.
Corentin Jean (Lens) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 29, Corner awarded to Lens.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Lens's Corentin Jean misses with an attempt on goal.
In the minute 31, Ball goes out of play for a Dijon goal kick.
Dijon to take a throw-in in Lens territory.
Dijon are whistled for offside.
In the minute 35, Dijon awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Free kick Dijon.
Dijon awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 39, Eric Wattellier signals a free kick to Lens in their own half.
Moussa Konate gets his shot on target but fails to score for Dijon.
Eric Wattellier awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 43, Free kick for Lens in the half of Dijon.
Throw-in for Lens at Stade Gaston Gerard.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 45, Free kick for Lens in their own half.
Lens awarded a free kick in their own half.
Eric Wattellier signals a free kick to Lens.
In the minute 45, Lens's Corentin Jean is on target but unsuccessful.
Lens have been awarded a corner by Eric Wattellier.
Goal kick for Dijon at Stade Gaston Gerard.
In the minute 45, Eric Wattellier will wait an extra 2 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the 1st half.
The whistle has gone to end the first-half.
The whistle has gone to start the second-half.
In the minute 46, Eric Wattellier signals a free kick to Lens.
Eric Wattellier signals a Dijon throw-in in Lens's half.
Free kick Dijon.
In the minute 47, Dijon's Jordan Marie breaks free at Stade Gaston Gerard. But the strike goes wide of the post.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Dijon-Prenois.
Throw-in for Lens in their own half.
In the minute 49, Eric Wattellier signals a throw-in for Dijon, close to Lens's area.
Throw-in for Dijon close to the penalty box.
Eric Wattellier signals a free kick to Lens in their own half.
In the minute 53, Mama Balde for Dijon gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Eric Wattellier awards Lens a goal kick.
Mama Balde (Dijon) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 54, Lens awarded a free kick in their own half.
Chafik (Dijon) has received a yellow card from Eric Wattellier.
Throw-in Lens.
In the minute 56, In Dijon-Prenois a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Jordan Marie is booked for the home team.
In the minute 58, Lens are coming forward and Florian Sotoca gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Ball goes out of play for a Dijon goal kick.
Chafik is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
Chafik for Dijon is back on the field again.
In the minute 61, Dijon have a goal kick.
Aurelien Scheidler is replacing Moussa Konate for Dijon at Stade Gaston Gerard.
The home team have replaced Roger Assale with Frederic Sammaritano. This is the third substitution made today by David Linares.
In the minute 64, Dijon drive upfield and Bersant Celina gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Lens defender.
Corner awarded to Dijon.
Dijon to take a throw-in in Lens territory.
In the minute 66, Free kick for Lens in their own half.
Franck Haise is making the team's first substitution at Stade Gaston Gerard with Gael Kakuta replacing Corentin Jean.
Dijon have been awarded a corner by Eric Wattellier.
In the minute 70, Free kick for Lens in the half of Dijon.
Throw-in for Dijon in the half of Lens.
Ball safe as Lens is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 72, Franck Haise is making the team's second substitution at Stade Gaston Gerard with Cheick Oumar Doucoure replacing Seko Fofana.
Can Lens get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Dijon's half?
Lens's Ignatius Kpene Ganago gets in a shot on goal at Stade Gaston Gerard. But the effort is unsuccessful.
In the minute 74, Lens push forward at Stade Gaston Gerard and Ignatius Kpene Ganago gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Dijon defence.
Lens push upfield but Eric Wattellier quickly pulls them for offside.
Dijon drives forward and Mama Balde gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
In the minute 76, In Dijon-Prenois a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Free kick for Lens in the half of Dijon.
In the minute 78, Eric Wattellier signals a free kick to Dijon in their own half.
Lens make their third substitution with Ignatius Kpene Ganago replacing Arnaud Kalimuendo.
Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Mama Balde for Dijon who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
Dijon's Mama Balde looks ok and returns to the pitch.
In the minute 81, Throw-in Dijon.
Dijon awarded a throw-in in their own half.
David Linares (Dijon) is making a fourth substitution, with Sacha Boey replacing Chafik.
In the minute 83, Eric Wattellier signals a Dijon throw-in in Lens's half.
Throw-in for Dijon in their own half.
Throw-in for Lens at Stade Gaston Gerard.
In the minute 84, Ignatius Kpene Ganago (Lens) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Lens have been awarded a corner by Eric Wattellier.
Corner awarded to Lens.
In the minute 85, Lens's Jonathan Clauss gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Goal kick for Dijon at Stade Gaston Gerard.
Florian Sotoca of Lens smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
In the minute 87, Dijon have a goal kick.
Clement Michelin is replacing Jonathan Clauss for the away team.
The away team replace Florian Sotoca with Simon Banza.
In the minute 89, Throw-in for Dijon in the half of Lens.
The match at Stade Gaston Gerard has been interrupted briefly for a check on Jonathan Gradit, who is down injured.
Eric Wattellier signals a free kick to Lens.
Lens’s Jonathan Gradit is on his feet again at Stade Gaston Gerard.
Can Dijon get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Lens's half?
The fourth official's board shows 5 minutes, which will be added to the 2nd half.
Dijon to take a throw-in in Lens territory.
Eric Wattellier awards the away team a throw-in.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Lens pushes forward through Gael Kakuta, whose finish on goal is saved.
Throw-in for Dijon in the half of Lens.
Free kick Dijon.
In Dijon-Prenois Dijon attack through Bersant Celina. The finish is off target, however.
Dijon are pushing forward but Mama Balde's finish is wide of the goal.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Dijon-Prenois.
It's 0-1 as the referee blows for full-time.
